original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / srid pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do /
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / srid pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do /
translated: Thus, these two things—the unproduced and existence—are not two and are not divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unproduced, one cannot see production.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two things—the unproduced and production—are not two and are not divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unproduced, one cannot see old age and death.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rga shi zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rga shi zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two things—the unproduced and old age and death—are not two and are not divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unproduced, one cannot see the perfection of giving.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘perfection of giving’ are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, he does not see the perfection of morality;

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshul khrims kyi @159b pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshul khrims kyi @159b pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘perfection of morality’ are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, he does not see the perfection of patience;

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘perfection of patience’ are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from what has not come into being, they do not see the perfection of perseverance.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, what has not come into being and the perfection of perseverance—these two dharmas are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from what has not come into being, they do not see the perfection of concentration.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, what has not come into being and the perfection of concentration—these two dharmas are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from what has not come into being, they do not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘perfection of wisdom’ are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste //
translated: Apart from the unreal, the emptiness of internal is not apprehended.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par phyi @160a *//
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par phyi @160a *//
translated: Thus, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘emptiness of internal’ are not two and cannot be made two.

original: stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, the emptiness of external is not apprehended.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘emptiness of external’ are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, the emptiness of internal and external is not apprehended.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the unapprehendable and the emptiness of external and internal, are not two and cannot be split into two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unapprehendable, one does not see the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the unapprehendable and the emptiness of emptiness, are not two and cannot be split into two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unapprehendable, one does not see the emptiness of great extent.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the unapprehendable and the emptiness of great extent, are not two and cannot be split into two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unapprehendable, one does not see the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, “unreal” and “emptiness of the ultimate,” are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, one does not see the emptiness of the conditioned as real;

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i @160b chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i @160b chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: thus, these two dharmas, “unreal” and “emptiness of the conditioned,” are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, one does not see the emptiness of the unconditioned as real;

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par /
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par /
translated: thus, these two dharmas, “unreal” and “emptiness of the unconditioned,” are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, one does not see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as real;

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the unproduced and the emptiness of the beyond of extremes, are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unproduced, the emptiness of the beyond of beginning and end is not apprehended.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the unproduced and the emptiness of the beyond of beginning and end, are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unproduced, the emptiness of non-rejection is not apprehended.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the unproduced and the emptiness of non-rejection, are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, one does not see the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs @161a *//
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs @161a *//
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called the uncreated and the emptiness of essential nature are not two, nor are they divided.

original: par chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: par chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, one does not see the emptiness of all dharmas.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called the uncreated and the emptiness of all dharmas are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, one does not see the emptiness of essential characteristics.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, non-production and emptiness of own-marks, are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from non-production, one does not see emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, non-production and emptiness of non-apprehension, are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from non-production, one does not see emptiness of non-things.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, non-production and emptiness of non-things, are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called the uncreated and the emptiness of essential nature are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su @161b mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su @161b mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called the uncreated and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the applications of mindfulness.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, called ‘unreal’ and ‘the applications of mindfulness’, are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, the right efforts are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, called ‘unreal’ and ‘the right efforts’, are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, the legs of miraculous power are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, called ‘unreal’ and ‘the legs of miraculous power’, are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, the faculties are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dbang po rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / dbang po rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the faculties, are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, the powers are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / stobs rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / stobs rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the powers, are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon @162a *// par ma grub pa ma gtogs par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon @162a *// par ma grub pa ma gtogs par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, the limbs of enlightenment are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the limbs of enlightenment, are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, one does not see the noble eightfold path.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the noble eightfold path, are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, one does not see the noble truths.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the noble truths, are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, one does not see the concentrations.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / bsam gtan rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / bsam gtan rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the concentrations, are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par tshad med pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par tshad med pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the immeasurables.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshad med pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshad med pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the uncreated and the immeasurables—these two dharmas are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon bar ma grub pa ma gtogs par gzugs @162b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon bar ma grub pa ma gtogs par gzugs @162b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the formless concentrations.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the uncreated and the formless concentrations—these two dharmas are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam par thar pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam par thar pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the deliverances.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: As such, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘liberations’ are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, the serial formulations for the meditative concentrations are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: As such, the two dharmas called ‘unreal’ and ‘serial formulations for the meditative concentrations’ are not dual and cannot be made dual.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unreal, the door of liberation called emptiness, the door of liberation called signlessness, and the door of liberation called wishlessness are not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: thus, these two dharmas—the non-arising of the powers and the powers—are not two and cannot be divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis @163a *//
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis @163a *//
translated: Apart from the non-arising of the forces, they do not see the forces;🔽thus, these two dharmas—the non-arising of the forces and the forces—are not two and cannot be divided.🔽Apart from the non-arising of the faculties, they do not see the faculties;

original: su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: thus, these two dharmas—the non-arising of the faculties and the faculties—are not two and cannot be divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the non-arising of the branches of enlightenment, they do not see the branches of enlightenment;🔽thus, these two dharmas—the non-arising of the branches of enlightenment and the branches of enlightenment—are not two and cannot be divided.🔽Apart from the non-arising of the branches of the path, they do not see the branches of the path;🔽thus, these two dharmas—the non-arising of the branches of the path and the branches of the path—are not two and cannot be divided.🔽Apart from the non-arising of the concentrations, they do not see the concentrations;

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: thus, these two dharmas—the non-arising of the concentrations and the concentrations—are not two and cannot be divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from what has not come into being, they do not see the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, what has been called ‘the non-arising of the dhāraṇī gateways’ is one thing, and what has been called ‘the dhāraṇī gateways’ is another.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from what has not come into being, they do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, what has been called ‘the non-arising of the ten powers of the tathāgatas’ is one thing, and what has been called ‘the ten powers of the tathāgatas’ is another.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from what has not come into being, they do not see the four fearlessnesses.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, what has been called ‘the non-arising of the four fearlessnesses’ is one thing, and what has been called ‘the four fearlessnesses’ is another.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the four detailed and thorough knowledges apart from nonproduction.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called “nonproduction” and “the four detailed and thorough knowledges” are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par @163b ma grub pa ma gtogs par byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par @163b ma grub pa ma gtogs par byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the great love apart from nonproduction.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byams pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byams pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called “nonproduction” and “the great love” are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the great compassion apart from nonproduction.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas called “nonproduction” and “the great compassion” are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Apart from the uncreated, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not seen. Thus, these two dharmas, namely, the uncreated and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, are not two and cannot be divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, the knowledge of all aspects is not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, namely, the uncreated and the knowledge of all aspects, are not two and cannot be divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, the knowledge of the aspects of the path is not seen.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, i.e. the unapprehendable and the knowledge of the modes of the path, are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam pa thams @164a *//
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam pa thams @164a *//
translated: Apart from the unapprehendable, the knowledge of all modes is not apprehended.

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, i.e. the unapprehendable and the knowledge of all modes, are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mi dmigs so //
translated: apart from the unapprehendable, one does not apprehend any bodhisattva who would practice for awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: when it is taught like this,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If bodhisattva great beings are not afraid, terrified, and do not panic,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smras zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smras zhes zer ba ni /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad byed pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong la /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad byed pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong la /
translated: in that way bodhisattva great beings see all phenomena as inactive,

original: chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /🔽chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
translated: see all phenomena as like a dream,🔽see all phenomena as like an illusion,

original: chos thams cad smig rgyu dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /🔽chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad smig rgyu dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
translated: see all phenomena as like a mirage,🔽see all phenomena as like an echo,

original: chos thams cad mig yor dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad mig yor dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
translated: see all phenomena as like an apparition,🔽and

original: chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bas /
analyzed: chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bas /
translated: He sees all phenomena as like a magical creation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @164b la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @164b la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified when they hear this teaching.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: “Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /🔽'di ni gzugs zhes bgyi bar gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe / 'di ni gzugs zhes bgyi bar gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: and investigate these phenomena in this way,🔽they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not become fixated on, and do not designate form as ‘form.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba zhes bgyi bar tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba zhes bgyi bar tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to feeling, one does not apprehend ‘this is feeling’ and does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni 'du shes zhes bgyi bar 'du shes la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni 'du byed ces bgyi bar 'du byed la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni 'du shes zhes bgyi bar 'du shes la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni 'du byed ces bgyi bar 'du byed la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to perception, one does not apprehend ‘this is perception’ and does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: mngon par zhen par ma bgyid la 'dogs par ma bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par ma bgyid la 'dogs par ma bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to volitional factors, one does not apprehend ‘these are volitional factors’ and does not take them up, does not dwell on them, does not fixate on them, and does not label them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to consciousness, one does not apprehend ‘this is consciousness’ and does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mig ces bgyi bar mig la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mig ces bgyi bar mig la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the eyes, one does not apprehend ‘this is the eyes’ and does not take them up, does not dwell on them, does not fixate on them, and does not label them.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba zhes bgyi bar rna ba la mi dmigs shing @165a *//
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba zhes bgyi bar rna ba la mi dmigs shing @165a *//
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take a stand on it, and do not settle down on it.

original: mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not take a stand on, and do not settle down on the ear as ‘the ear.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni sna zhes bgyi bar sna la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni lce zhes bgyi bar lce la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni sna zhes bgyi bar sna la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni lce zhes bgyi bar lce la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not take a stand on, and do not settle down on the nose as ‘the nose.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni lus zhes bgyi bar lus la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni lus zhes bgyi bar lus la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not take a stand on, and do not settle down on the tongue as ‘the tongue.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not take a stand on, and do not settle down on the body as ‘the body.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni yid ces bgyi bar yid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni yid ces bgyi bar yid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not take a stand on, and do not settle down on the mind as ‘the mind.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni gzugs zhes bgyi bar gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi lan mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni gzugs zhes bgyi bar gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi lan mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend form as ‘form,’ do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni sgra zhes bgyi bar sgra la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni dri zhes bgyi bar dri la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni sgra zhes bgyi bar sgra la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni dri zhes bgyi bar dri la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend sound as ‘sound,’ do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend smell as ‘smell,’ do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ro zhes bgyi bar ro la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ro zhes bgyi bar ro la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend taste as ‘taste,’ do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni reg ces bgyi bar reg la mi dmigs shing mi len @165b mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni reg ces bgyi bar reg la mi dmigs shing mi len @165b mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend tangibles as ‘tangibles,’ do not take them up, do not take them as a basis, do not take them as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with them.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend mental phenomena as ‘mental phenomena,’ do not take them up, do not take them as a basis, do not take them as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with them.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni chos zhes bgyi bar chos la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni chos zhes bgyi bar chos la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take a stand on it, and do not give it a label.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not settle down on, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take a stand on, and do not give a label to the Dharma, thinking, ‘This is the Dharma.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not settle down on, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take a stand on, and do not give a label to the eye consciousness, thinking, ‘This is the eye consciousness.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not settle down on, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take a stand on, and do not give a label to the ear consciousness, thinking, ‘This is the ear consciousness.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not settle down on, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take a stand on, and do not give a label to the nose consciousness, thinking, ‘This is the nose consciousness.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, and do not settle down on it as ‘mine.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, and do not settle down on the tongue consciousness as ‘mine.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, and do not settle down on it as ‘mine.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, and do not settle down on the body consciousness as ‘mine.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, and do not settle down on it as ‘mine.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, and do not settle down on the thinking-mind consciousness as ‘mine.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi 'dus te @166a *//
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi 'dus te @166a *//
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, and do not settle down on it as ‘mine.’

original: reg pa zhes bgyi bar mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: reg pa zhes bgyi bar mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, and do not settle down on eye contact as ‘mine.’🔽They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, and do not settle down on it as ‘mine.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the ear sense-sphere, they do not apprehend the ear sense-sphere as the ear sense-sphere.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the nose sense-sphere, they do not apprehend the nose sense-sphere as the nose sense-sphere.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the tongue sense-sphere, they do not apprehend the tongue sense-sphere as the tongue sense-sphere.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the body sense-sphere, they do not apprehend the body sense-sphere as the body sense-sphere.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to mental contact, they do not apprehend mental contact as ‘mental contact.’ They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus @166b te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus @166b te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, they do not apprehend the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.’ They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.🔽At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, they do not apprehend the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.’ They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, they do not apprehend the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.’ They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.🔽At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, they do not apprehend the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.’ They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.🔽At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, they do not apprehend the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.’ They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not adhere to it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and smell, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not hold on to, does not become fixated on, and does not label it as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and smell.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and taste, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not hold on to, does not become fixated on, and does not label it as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and taste.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and touch, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not hold on to, does not become fixated on, and does not label it as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and touch.’🔽At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of mind and mental phenomena, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not hold on to, does not become fixated on, and does not label it as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of mind and mental phenomena.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni sa'i khams so zhes bgyi bar sa'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni sa'i khams so zhes bgyi bar sa'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mental faculty and mental objects, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not take a stand on, does not adhere to, and does not designate it as ‘the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mental faculty and mental objects.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni chu'i khams so zhes bgyi bar chu'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni chu'i khams so zhes bgyi bar chu'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the earth element, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not take a stand on, does not adhere to, and does not designate it as ‘the earth element.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs @167a *//🔽par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni me'i khams so zhes bgyi bar me'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs @167a *// par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni me'i khams so zhes bgyi bar me'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the water element, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not take a stand on, does not adhere to, and does not designate it as ‘the water element.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the fire element, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not take a stand on, does not adhere to, and does not designate it as ‘the fire element.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rlung gi khams so zhes bgyi bar rlung gi khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rlung gi khams so zhes bgyi bar rlung gi khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the wind element, one does not apprehend the wind element as ‘this is the wind element.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so zhes bgyi bar nam mkha'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so zhes bgyi bar nam mkha'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the space element, one does not apprehend the space element as ‘this is the space element.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the consciousness element, one does not apprehend the consciousness element as ‘this is the consciousness element.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ma rig pa'o zhes bgyi bar ma rig pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ma rig pa'o zhes bgyi bar ma rig pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to ignorance, one does not apprehend ignorance as ‘this is ignorance.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not take it up, does not dwell on it, does not fixate on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni 'du byed do zhes bgyi bar 'du byed la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni 'du byed do zhes bgyi bar 'du byed la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the formative predispositions, one does not apprehend them as ‘formative predispositions’; one does not grasp, nor does one abide in them.🔽One does not become fixated on them, nor does one designate them.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do; ;de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do; ;de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to consciousness, one does not apprehend it as ‘consciousness’; one does not grasp, nor does one abide in it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not become fixated on it, nor does one designate it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ming dang gzugs so zhes bgyi bar ming dang gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ming dang gzugs so zhes bgyi bar ming dang gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to name and form, one does not apprehend them as ‘name and form’; one does not grasp, nor does one abide in them.

original: mngon par @167b zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par @167b zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not become fixated on them, nor does one designate them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni skye mched drug ces bgyi bar skye mched drug la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni skye mched drug ces bgyi bar skye mched drug la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the six sense fields, one does not apprehend them as ‘the six sense fields’; one does not grasp, nor does one abide in them.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: One does not become fixated on them, nor does one designate them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni reg pa zhes bgyi bar reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni reg pa zhes bgyi bar reg pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to contact, one does not apprehend contact as ‘this is contact.’ One does not take it up, does not dwell on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba zhes bgyi bar tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba zhes bgyi bar tshor ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to feeling, one does not apprehend feeling as ‘this is feeling.’ One does not take it up, does not dwell on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni sred pa zhes bgyi bar sred pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni sred pa zhes bgyi bar sred pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to craving, one does not apprehend craving as ‘this is craving.’ One does not take it up, does not dwell on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni len pa zhes bgyi bar len pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni len pa zhes bgyi bar len pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to grasping, one does not apprehend grasping as ‘this is grasping.’ One does not take it up, does not dwell on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni srid pa zhes bgyi bar srid pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni srid pa zhes bgyi bar srid pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to becoming, one does not apprehend becoming as ‘this is becoming.’ One does not take it up, does not dwell on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni skye ba zhes bgyi bar skye ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni rga shi zhes bgyi bar rga shi la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni skye ba zhes bgyi bar skye ba la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni rga shi zhes bgyi bar rga shi la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to birth, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not settle down on, does not become attached to, and does not designate it as ‘this is birth.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to old age and death, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not settle down on, does not become attached to, and does not designate it as ‘this is old age and death.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos @168a *// de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /🔽'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: chos @168a *// de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: at that time, when they investigate phenomena in this way,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: in regard to the perfection of generosity, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not settle down on, does not become attached to, and does not designate it as ‘this is the perfection of generosity.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, the perfection of morality is not apprehended in the perfection of morality, which is called the perfection of morality. It is not taken up, does not remain,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become manifest, and is not imputed.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, the perfection of patience is not apprehended in the perfection of patience, which is called the perfection of patience. It is not taken up, does not remain,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become manifest, and is not imputed.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, the perfection of effort is not apprehended in the perfection of effort, which is called the perfection of effort. It is not taken up, does not remain,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become manifest, and is not imputed.
