original: de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the perfection of meditative stabilization, one does not apprehend the perfection of meditative stabilization as ‘this is the perfection of meditative stabilization.’🔽One does not take it up, does not remain in it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not designate it.🔽At that time, in regard to the perfection of wisdom, one does not apprehend the perfection of wisdom as ‘this is the perfection of wisdom.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: One does not take it up, does not remain in it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not designate it.🔽At that time, in regard to inner emptiness, one does not apprehend inner emptiness as ‘this is inner emptiness.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len @168b mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len @168b mi gnas te /
translated: One does not take it up, does not remain in it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not designate it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar phyi stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar phyi stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to outer emptiness, one does not apprehend outer emptiness as ‘this is outer emptiness.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not settle down on it as real.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take a stance on, and do not settle down on inner emptiness as ‘inner emptiness.’🔽They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not settle down on it as real.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take a stance on, and do not settle down on outer emptiness as ‘outer emptiness.’🔽They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not settle down on it as real.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take a stance on, and do not settle down on inner and outer emptiness as ‘inner and outer emptiness.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid de //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid de //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not settle down on it as real.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take a stance on, and do not settle down on the emptiness of emptiness as ‘the emptiness of emptiness.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not settle down on it as real.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar chen po stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar chen po stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take a stance on, and do not settle down on the great emptiness as ‘the great emptiness.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not settle down on it as real.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take a stance on, and do not settle down on the ultimate emptiness as ‘the ultimate emptiness.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend conditioned emptiness, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend unconditioned emptiness, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par @169a *//🔽mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par @169a *// mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend the emptiness of nature, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend the emptiness of all things, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend the emptiness of individual characteristics, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend the emptiness of all things, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, without apprehending and without taking up the emptiness that is neither with nor without something to rely on, they do not dwell on it and do not become fixated on it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, without apprehending and without taking up the emptiness that is not something to be discarded, they do not dwell on it and do not become fixated on it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, without apprehending and without taking up the emptiness of nature, they do not dwell on it and do not become fixated on it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, without apprehending and without taking up the emptiness of all phenomena, they do not dwell on it and do not become fixated on it.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the emptiness of its own mark, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of its own mark.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar mi dmigs pa stong @169b pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar mi dmigs pa stong @169b pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the emptiness of nonapprehension, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of nonapprehension.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the emptiness of nonthings, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of nonthings.’🔽At that time, with regard to the emptiness of intrinsic nature, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not take as a basis, do not take as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of intrinsic nature.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the emptiness of essential nature, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not dwell,🔽does not become fixated, and does not designate it as ‘this is the emptiness of essential nature.’🔽At that time, with regard to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not dwell,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated, and does not designate it as ‘this is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽de'i tshe 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi bar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi lan mi gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / de'i tshe 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi bar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi lan mi gnas te /
translated: further, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽at that time, with regard to the applications of mindfulness, one does not apprehend, does not grasp, does not dwell,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated, and does not designate them as ‘these are the applications of mindfulness.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bgyi bar yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bgyi bar yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to the four right efforts, one does not apprehend or grasp at ‘these are the four right efforts.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi bar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon @170a *// par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi bar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon @170a *// par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to the four bases of supernatural power, one does not apprehend or grasp at ‘these are the four bases of supernatural power.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni dbang po rnams zhes bgyi bar dbang po rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni dbang po rnams zhes bgyi bar dbang po rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to the five faculties, one does not apprehend or grasp at ‘these are the five faculties.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni stobs rnams zhes bgyi bar stobs rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni stobs rnams zhes bgyi bar stobs rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, in regard to the five powers, one does not apprehend or grasp at ‘these are the five powers.’🔽At that time, in regard to the seven aspects of enlightenment, one does not apprehend or grasp at ‘these are the seven aspects of enlightenment.’🔽At that time, in regard to the noble eightfold path, one does not apprehend or grasp at ‘this is the noble eightfold path.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi bar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi bar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the factors of awakening, one does not apprehend the factors of awakening, does not take them up, does not settle down on them,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on them, and does not label them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the eightfold noble path, one does not apprehend the eightfold noble path, does not take it up, does not settle down on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on it, and does not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the noble truths, one does not apprehend the noble truths, does not take them up, does not settle down on them,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: does not become fixated on them, and does not label them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan rnams zhes bgyi bar bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan rnams zhes bgyi bar bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, in regard to the concentrations, one does not apprehend the concentrations, does not take them up, does not settle down on them,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bgyi bar tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bgyi bar tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take it up, do not take it as a basis, do not take it as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with it.

original: mngon @170b par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi bar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon @170b par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi bar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend the immeasurables, do not take them up, do not take them as a basis, do not take them as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with them.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bgyi bar rnam par thar pa brgyad la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bgyi bar rnam par thar pa brgyad la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend the formless absorptions, do not take them up, do not take them as a basis, do not take them as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with them.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend the eight liberations, do not take them up, do not take them as a basis, do not take them as ‘mine,’ and do not become emotionally involved with them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bgyi bar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bgyi bar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /

translated: not adhered to, and not imputed as ‘these are the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.’🔽At that time, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bgyi bar mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bgyi bar mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: not adhered to, and not imputed as ‘these are the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.’🔽At that time, the superknowledges are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: not adhered to, and not imputed as ‘these are the superknowledges.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the concentrations, thinking, ‘These are the concentrations.’

translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as the self, and do not settle down on the concentrations as ‘these are the concentrations.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni stobs rnams zhes bgyi bar stobs rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni stobs rnams zhes bgyi bar stobs rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi bar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi bar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as the self, and do not settle down on the powers as ‘these are the powers.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as the self, and do not settle down on the branches of awakening as ‘these are the branches of awakening.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /

translated: not adhered to, and not imputed as ‘this is the noble eightfold path.’🔽At that time, the noble truths are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //

analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bgyi bar tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi @171.1b len mi gnas te /
translated: not adhered to, and not imputed as ‘these are the concentrations.’🔽At that time, the immeasurables are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //

analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu zhes bgyi bar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: not adhered to, and not imputed as ‘these are the eight aspects of liberation.’🔽At that time, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te //
translated: At that time, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //

translated: At that time, the supernormal knowledges are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in, not adhered to, and not imputed.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid @171.2a *//
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid @171.2a *//
translated: At that time, the meditative stabilizations are not apprehended, not taken up, not dwelled in,

original: la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: not adhered to, and not imputed.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bgyi bar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bgyi bar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as a self, and do not become fixated on the dhāraṇī gateways, thinking, ‘These are the dhāraṇī gateways.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as a self, and do not become fixated on the ten powers of the tathāgatas, thinking, ‘These are the ten powers of the tathāgatas.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi bar mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi bar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi bar mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi bar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as a self, and do not become fixated on the four fearlessnesses, thinking, ‘These are the four fearlessnesses.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as a self, and do not become fixated on the four detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘These are the four detailed and thorough knowledges.’🔽At that time, they do not apprehend, do not take up, do not settle down on, do not consider as a self, and do not become fixated on the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, thinking, ‘These are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bgyi bar byams pa chen po la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni snying rje chen po zhes bgyi bar snying rje chen po la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bgyi bar byams pa chen po la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni snying rje chen po zhes bgyi bar snying rje chen po la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to great love, one does not apprehend great love, does not take it up, does not settle down on it, does not affirm it, and does not designate it as ‘great love.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi bar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi bar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to great compassion, one does not apprehend great compassion, does not take it up, does not settle down on it, does not affirm it, and does not designate it as ‘great compassion.’

original: @171.2b mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi bar thams cad shes pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: @171.2b mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do // de'i tshe 'di ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi bar thams cad shes pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, with regard to the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha, one does not apprehend the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha, does not take them up, does not settle down on them, does not affirm them, and does not designate them as ‘the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, with regard to the knowledge of all aspects, one does not apprehend the knowledge of all aspects, does not take it up, does not settle down on it, does not affirm it, and does not designate it as ‘the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ces bgyi bar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ces bgyi bar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, the path of cognition itself is not apprehended in the cognition of the aspects of the path, it is not taken up, it does not dwell,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: it does not settle down, and it is not imputed.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: At that time, the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the knowledge of all aspects, it is not taken up, it does not dwell,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do ////
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do ////
translated: it does not settle down, and it is not imputed.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po gya drug pa //
analyzed: bam po gya drug pa //
translated: Fascicle Sixty-Six

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when bodhisattva mahasattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la mi dmigs shing mi len mi gnas te /
translated: These are called the ‘dhāraṇī gateway’ and the ‘dhāraṇī door.’ They do not apprehend, do not take up, do not dwell on,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: and do not settle down on or designate any dhāraṇī gateway or dhāraṇī door.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: It is because when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽tshor pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshor pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see form,🔽they do not see feeling,

original: 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'du byed yang dag @172a *//
analyzed: 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'du byed yang dag @172a *//
translated: they do not see perception,

original: par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: and they do not see consciousness;

original: mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

original: rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sna yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sna yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the ears,🔽they do not see the nose,

original: lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the tongue,🔽and they do not see the body;

original: lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the body.

original: yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the mind.

original: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see form.

original: sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see sound.🔽They do not see smell.

original: ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see taste.🔽They do not see texture.

original: chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sna'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the ear consciousness.🔽They do not see the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the composite of ear contact.🔽They do not see the composite of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the composite of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the composite of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the composite of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis @172b tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis @172b tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of eye contact.🔽They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of ear contact.🔽They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of mental contact.🔽They do not see the earth element.

original: chu'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chu'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the water element.

original: me'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rlung gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: me'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rlung gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the fire element.🔽They do not see the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ma rig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see ignorance.

original: 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see name and form.

original: skye mched drug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: skye mched drug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the six sense sources.

original: reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see contact.

original: tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see feeling.

original: sred pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: sred pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see craving.

original: len pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽srid pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: len pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / srid pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see grasping.🔽They do not see becoming.

original: skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see birth.

original: rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol @173a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol @173a *//
translated: They do not see the perfection of generosity.

original: tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the perfection of discipline.🔽They do not see the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
translated: They do not see the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see outer emptiness.🔽They do not see inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They do not see great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They do not see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They do not see the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They do not see the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @173b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @173b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-entities.🔽They do not see the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽They do not see the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not see the faculties.

original: stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the aspects of the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi @174a *//
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi @174a *//
translated: they do not see the four fearlessnesses,

original: mthong / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mthong / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽they do not see great love,

original: snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the knowledge of all aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see the knowledge of the aspects of the path,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: and they do not see the knowledge of all things.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags te /
translated: “Blessed One, the non-arising of form is not form.

original: de ltar na gzugs dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
translated: Thus, form and non-arising are not two,

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags /

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: not two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: not many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: and not distinct.

analyzed: de'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the non-arising of form is not form.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de tshor ba ma lags te /
analyzed: tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de tshor ba ma lags te /
translated: the non-arising of feeling is not feeling.

original: de ltar na tshor ba dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: de ltar na tshor ba dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
translated: Thus, feeling and non-arising are not two,

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: de'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, the extinction of bodily contact is not bodily contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags te /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the extinction of mental contact is not mental contact.

original: de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
translated: Thus, mental contact and its extinction are not two,

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: it is because extinction is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: not two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: not many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: and not separate.

original: de'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, any diminution of mental contact is not mental contact.
